text: SubhanAllah
translation: Glory be to Allah

text: Alhamdulillah
translation: All praise is due to Allah

text: Allahu Akbar
translation: Allah is the Greatest

text: La ilaha illallah
translation: There is no god but Allah

text: Astaghfirullah
translation: I seek forgiveness from Allah

text: La hawla wa la quwwata illa billah
translation: There is no power nor strength except with Allah

text: SubhanAllahi wa bihamdihi
translation: Glory be to Allah and all praise is due to Him

text: SubhanAllahi al-azeem
translation: Glory be to Allah, the Great

text: Allahumma salli 'ala Muhammad
translation: O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad

text: Bismillah
translation: In the name of Allah

text: Rabbi zidni ilma
translation: My Lord, increase me in knowledge

text: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min al-hammi wal-huzni
translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from anxiety and sorrow

text: Allahumma inni as'aluka al-huda wat-tuqa wal-'afafa wal-ghina
translation: O Allah, I ask You for guidance, piety, chastity and self-sufficiency

text: Hasbiyallahu la ilaha illa Huwa
translation: Allah is sufficient for me; there is no deity except Him

text: La ilaha illallahu wahdahu la sharika lahu, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu yuhyi wa yumitu wa huwa hayyun la yamutu abadan, abadan, zul-jalali wal-ikram
translation: There is no god but Allah alone, with no partner. His is the dominion and His is the praise, He gives life and causes death, and He is ever-living and never dies, Lord of Majesty and Honor

text: La ilaha illallah, Muhammadur Rasulullah
translation: There is no god but Allah, Muhammad is the Messenger of Allah

text: Allahumma inni as'aluka al-jannah
translation: O Allah, I ask You for Paradise

text: Allahumma aghfir li
translation: O Allah, forgive me

text: La ilaha illa anta, subhanaka inni kuntu minaz-zalimin
translation: There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers

text: Astaghfirullaha Rabbi min kulli dhambin wa atubu ilayh
translation: I seek forgiveness from Allah, my Lord, from every sin and I repent to Him

text: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min sharri nafsi
translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evil of myself

text: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min al-ma'thami wal-maghram
translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from sin and debt

text: SubhanAllahi wa bihamdihi SubhanAllahi al-azeem
translation: Glory be to Allah and praise be to Him, Glory be to Allah the Great

text: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min al-kufri wal-faqr
translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from disbelief and poverty

text: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min 'adhabi jahannam
translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of Hell

text: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min fitnatil-mahya wal-mamat
translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the trials of life and death

text: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min fitnatil-qabri wa 'adhabi jahannam
translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the trial of the grave and the punishment of Hell

text: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min al-kufri wal-ma'thami wal-maghram
translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from disbelief, sin and debt

text: SubhanAllahi wa bihamdihi, SubhanAllahi al-azeem, la ilaha illa Allah
translation: Glory be to Allah and all praise is due to Him, Glory be to Allah the Great, there is no god but Allah

text: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min al-hammi wal-huzni wal-ajzi wal-kasali
translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from worry, sorrow, incapacity and laziness

text: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min al-jubni wal-bukhli
translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from cowardice and miserliness

text: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min ghalabatid-dayni wa qahrir-rijal
translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from overwhelming debt and oppression of men

text: Allahumma inni as'aluka al-afiyah
translation: O Allah, I ask You for well-being

text: Allahumma inni as'aluka al-jannah wa a'udhu bika min an-nar
translation: O Allah, I ask You for Paradise and seek refuge in You from the Fire

text: Allahumma inni as'aluka ilman nafi'an, wa rizqan tayyiban, wa 'amalan mutaqabbalan
translation: O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge, good provision and accepted deeds

text: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min fitnati dunya wa 'adhabi akhirah
translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the trials of this world and the punishment of the Hereafter

text: Allahumma inni as'aluka hubbaka, wa hubba man yuhibbuka, wal-'amala allathee yuballighuni hubbaka
translation: O Allah, I ask You for Your love, the love of those who love You, and deeds that bring me closer to Your love

text: La ilaha illallahu wahdahu la sharika lahu
translation: There is no god but Allah alone, with no partner

text: SubhanAllahi wa bihamdihi, SubhanAllahi al-azeem, Allahumma salli 'ala Muhammad
translation: Glory be to Allah and all praise is due to Him, Glory be to Allah the Great, O Allah send blessings upon Muhammad

text: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min sharri ma 'amiltu wa min sharri ma lam a'mal
translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the evil of what I have done and from the evil of what I have not done

text: Astaghfirullaha wa atubu ilayh
translation: I seek Allah's forgiveness and repent to Him

text: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika min al-kufri wal-faqr wal-`ajzi wal-kasali
translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from disbelief, poverty, incapacity and laziness
